topics.body:
Sorry to bring this up again, but. Just found out that there people who got made at one of the new IDW pony issues...cause one panel looked similar to another and they thought was a copy and past panel (a common technique in comics by the way)

I have to say, some of these people, I really hope they don't try getting any further into comics, Cause I don't think they could handle it. At all. 


Okay Rant over. MORE CELL!

So do I. XD

Nazis reviving the Teutonic Knights to fight on their side? Against Soviet troops who are armed with modern weapons?

Teutons were Germans. But despite that and the fact that Nazis used Teutonic themes in their propaganda. The modern Roman Catholic branch of the order was suppressed by the regime when Germany occupied Austria during WW2.
